fullText: Motown The Musical is less a musical than a marketing opportunity, a greatest-hits concert with some biographical filler and a few dance numbers thrown in.
dtliExcerpt: Motown The Musical is less a musical than a marketing opportunity, a greatest-hits concert with some biographical filler and a few dance numbers thrown in.
